naslov: Luksuzna kuća Stara Novalja, 1. red do mora i plaže, otok Pag (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se prekrasna luksuzna vila s bazenom i pogledom na more u Staroj Novalji, otok Pag, 1. red do mora i prekrasne plaže. U blizini kuće nalazi se prekrasna plaža, kafići, restorani i trgovina. Stara Novalja je mirno mjesto udaljeno 2km do grada Novalje, u kojemu se nalaze Dom Zdravlja, vrtić, škola, supermarketi, marketi, benzinske crpke i ostali sadržaji potrebni za ugodan život ili ljetni boravak, te 6 km od popularne plaže Zrće. U blizini se nalazi i mjesto Lun, poznato po svojim prekrasnim maslinicima. Prednost otoka Paga je ta što je, osim trajektom, kopnom povezan i Paškim mostom. Aerodrom Zadar udaljen je 80 km, a trajektno pristanište 9km. Kuća se nalazi na terenu od 487 m2. Sama kuća ima 262,02 m2 i sastoji se od prizemlja i kata. U prizemlju se nalaze ulazni hodnik, prostrani dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonom, WC, tehnički prostor i spremište. Iz dnevnog boravka se izlazi na prostranu terasu s bazenom. Na 1. katu nalaze se hodnik i 3 spavaće sobe, svaka sa svojom kupaonom i svojim privatnim natkrivenim balkonom s pogledom na more. Slobodno nas kontaktirajte vezano za sva dodatna pitanja i ogled nekretnine na brojeve 0996731949 ili 0994158314. ___________________ EN This beautiful luxury villa for sale with a pool and a view of the sea is located in Stara Novalja, the island of Pag, 1st row to the sea and beautiful beach. Near the house there is a yellow, sandy beach, cafes, restaurants and shops. Stara Novalja is a quiet place 2 km distance to the town of Novalja, where you can find Dom Zdravlja, a kindergarten, a school, supermarkets, markets, gas stations and other facilities necessary for a pleasant life or summer stay, and 6 km from the popular Zrće beach. Nearby is the town of Lun, known for its beautiful olive groves. The advantage of the island of Pag is that, in addition to the ferry, it is also connected to the mainland by the Pag bridge. Zadar airport is 80 km away, and the ferry port is 9 km away. The house is located on a plot of 487 m2. The house itself has 262.02 m2 and consists of a ground floor and a first floor. On the ground floor there is an entrance hall, a spacious living room with a kitchen and dining area, a toilet, a technical area and a storage room. The living room opens up to a spacious terrace with a swimming pool. On the 1st floor there is a hallway and 3 bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and its own private covered balcony with a view of the sea.
